content:
En kartthaave! Kopatthaal shaasikkaruthe
Shikshikkayumaruthennevam keertthichaan daaveedu
Thankaiyaal nirmmitharoopam paazhaayu pokaan
Kaivediyaathe kanivennum Daivam kaanikkum.

Praarththhippaan aalayamaarnnon dosham neekki
Thandehatthodu dehiyeyum samrakshichennaal
Thalpraarththhanayum yaachanayum naathhan kellkkum
Nyaayattheerppin naallingkal cheyyum kaarunyam.

Eeshaa! Naathhaa! Varika thunappaan villikoottunnu
Praarththhana kettittaathmaakkallmel krpa cheyyenam.

Daivasuthan sheelippichoraa praarththhana ramyam
Ullllilathetti dhyaanikkunnon dhanyan thanne
Thaalpparyatthodaa praarththhanayil muzhukeedunnon
Kandettheedum sampoornnathathan bhamgikallellaam.

Paapamashesham pokkanamennaa thaathanodothaan
Divyarahasyatthinsutharetthaan sheelippichu
Thante kadakkaarodu porukkaan dhairyam nalki
Mukthikkaayittarththhicheedaanupadeshichu.

Sarvvam kettittabhyarththhanaye kaikkollvone!
Praarththhana kettittaathmaakkallmel krpa cheyyenam.
